note:
Total millennial climate doomerist who's highly sceptical of pretty much all suggested directions society seem to be striving towards. Usually the test of *scale* guides my scepticism.

An avid everyday 'non-spectacular cyclist with a weird computer (wife says so) and an honest hypocrite.

Humbly guiding two kids through the madness of reality balancing the scary with the blissful wonders of earth.

Toots will be in English and Swedish. Politics may occur.
